description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Temporary road closures for Sai Kung 50
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 為配合西貢50活動的臨時封路安排

2026-02-25T14:40:00.CONTENT_EN:
To facilitate the holding of the Sai Kung 50 on 28 February 2026 (Saturday), temporary road closures will be implemented at Tai Mong Tsai Road, Sai Kung Man Yee Road and Sai Kung Sai Wan Road, Sai Kung:

From 6.15 am to 7.30 am on 28 February 2026

(i) The section of Tai Mong Tsai Road between Pak Tam Chung Physically Handicapped and Able-bodied Site and Pak Tam Road will be intermittently closed; and

(ii) The section of Tai Mong Tsai Road between Pak Tam Road and Sai Kung Man Yee Road will be temporarily closed


From 5.30 am to 8.30 am on 28 February 2026

(i) The section of Sai Kung Sai Wan Road from its junction with Tai Mong Tsai Road to a point about 4.9 kilometres east of the same junction will be temporarily closed; and

(ii) The section of Sai Kung Man Yee Road from its junction with Tai Mong Tsai Road to a point about 8.3 kilometres south of the same junction will be temporarily closed. 

During the road closure, all vehicular traffic (including franchised buses, green minibuses and taxis) will be prohibited to enter the aforementioned road sections, until the reopening of the road. Appropriate traffic signs will be erected on site to guide motorists. 

Other temporary road and traffic control measures, including adjusting the extent of road closures and alteration or suspension of public transport services, may be implemented by the Police at short notice depending on the actual traffic conditions. The TD appeals to the public to pay attention to the temporary road closures and public transport service adjustment arrangements. Members of the public who plan to go to the affected areas should plan their journey in advance, allow sufficient travelling time to avoid unexpected delay. Motorists and visitors should exercise patience and follow the instructions of the Police on-site.
2026-02-25T14:40:00.CONTENT_CN:
為配合2026年2月28日(星期六)舉行的西貢50活動，當局將於活動期間在西貢大網仔路、西貢萬宜路及西貢西灣路實施以下臨時封路安排：

2026年2月28日上午6時15分至上午7時30分

(一)大網仔路介乎北潭涌傷健樂園及北潭路之間的路段將間歇性封閉；及

(二)大網仔路介乎北潭路及西貢萬宜路之間的路段將臨時封閉。

2026年2月28日上午5時30分至上午8時30分

(一)西貢西灣路由其與大網仔路交界處起至同一交界以東約4.9公里
處止的路段將臨時封閉；及

(二)西貢萬宜路由其與大網仔路交界處起至同一交界以南約8.3公里處止的路段將臨時封閉。

封路期間，所有車輛(包括專營巴士、專線小巴及的士)不得進入上述路段，直至道路重開為止。有關地點將設置適當的交通標誌，指導駕駛人士。

警方會視乎現場實際路面情況而在短時間內實施其他臨時道路及交通管制措施，包括調整封路範圍和更改或暫停公共運輸服務。運輸署呼籲市民留意臨時封路及公共運輸服務改動安排。市民應及早計劃行程及預留額外的時間以免延誤。駕駛人士及遊人請保持忍讓，並遵從在場警務人員的指示。
